Name: Toy - Orange Fireworks
Description:
Summon an orange firework in front of you.
Approach and tap the button to set off the firework.
Summoned toy lasts 10 minutes.
Description2$english:
Toy Usage Restrictions:
1. Toy summoning is limited per area. Try switching to another if you've reached the max.
2. Toy count is also limited near each character. Please summon in a more open area if needed.

recipes.Name: Toy - Orange Fireworks
recipes.Des: A firework-style toy that dazzles with bursts of mesmerizing orange hues. Occasionally discovered during alchemical experimentation.

NeedMaterial.Name: Neutralizing Reaction Catalyst
NeedMaterial.Description: A material needed for Alchemy that can fuse the properties of different raw materials.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: Two substances that originally do not interact will undergo a transformation upon contact with a specific medium. This change induced by a specific substance is vividly referred to as the "catalyst effect" in alchemical techniques.
